I use tsar bomba and blow up your army.

My hill.

I actually meant to give the rocket to you ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")  

VLS-3 feels...  

anyway, I use Collor, he shuts down your nuclear program 1 week prior detonating the bomb  
  
![200px-Fernando_collor.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ec/Fernando_collor.jpg/200px-Fernando_collor.jpg)  

the hill is still mine due to lack of nukes

ma hill  

also, why would you put him in charge of it? launch will be cancelled and rocket scrapped 1 week prior every launch... poor jeb ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")
